Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2008 05:52AM quinda wrote: I know what you mean.  I had a core needle and waited and waited, came back cancer.  Then a lumpectomy and lymphnodectomy on thursday June 26, 08 and now I am waiting and waiting and waiting to move to the next thing which is a cancer doctor.  I wish I could fast forward my life several weeks.  The working through this is horrible.    Also I just found out that Rosebud passed away on June l0th 2008.  She had been using this website while having breast cancer.  Her blog spot is called Rose colored chemo.  Some of you might know her.  It wasn't the cancer.  Something went wrong in her brain.  Only 46 years old.!!!!!!!  I did her hair for l8 years and I am so sad to lose her.  She was the sweetness of our breast cancer girls.
Posts.Title: Waiting Biopsy Carol315 leaf

Posts.Content: quinda wrote: I just found out a couple of weeks ago I have breast cancer.  I am waiting, waiting, and waiting for the path. report after Thursday's lumpectomy.  Thank you all for being here for sure.  Makes me feel better!!!!!!!!!!!!1 Dx 6/19/2008, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Newly to cancer quinda sbmolee

Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2008 09:23PM quinda wrote: Thank You.  I am new.  Just had mastectomy on Thursday and now healing then tomorrow drains out and I am scared to almost death about chemo.  Just gotta wait and see what that is like just like everything else so thank you for this list of suggestions.  This is going to help.
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
